body:
Here is an alternative solution from Kevin Gillette
https://github.com/xtgo/set

On Fri, 22 Jul 2016, 13:15 Rob Pike <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> The type map[T]bool makes a lovely set type for items of type T.
> map[T]struct{} is more efficient but a little clumsier to use. Given how
> easy it is, I see no need for a builtin set type.
>
> This topic has come up many times in the mailing list but there doesn't
> seem to be a proposal for it, so thanks for doing that.
>
> I will let others weigh in.
>
